posts.message:
Hello Dears
Does any one hear about isolsoft Ticketing system PHP Script ? Can any one help me to get that script  because there's no longer support for this system

What do you use for testing iOS and Safari when you don't have a Mac or and iPhone?  

what I mean by testing is console error messages and functionality not screen resolutions

Edit:
testing web applications I mean
Have any one tried Android Studio 2 on Linux, what's the performance of its new emulator ?

I think I can get the WSDL file for any .NET web service by appending  ?WSDL  to the end of service base URL, But how I can get RSDL for RUSTful service? 
Thanks

I need any way to open and update .db file generated by "DacEasy",
I don't know DBMS they use... any suggestions

Hey guys,i just want to mention that my experience with the new android emulator is really awesome and unexpected..
I was working on Android studio and I had many problems with the emulator as I have a low specs laptop..I had to close all my Linux apps on using android studio to be able to work smoothly..but on running the emulator in most cases my laptop freezes so I stopped using emulator..
After watching the last android developer summit I wasn't excited by the new features but after switching to the canary channel and trying the new emulator I was able to run it in a few seconds with Google chrome (the RAM eater) and the emulator worked very smooth with the new awesome controls, Instant ru, Drag & drop and many features..although it's in preview version but I recommend you to try it :'D
http://android-developers.blogspot.com.eg/2015/12/android-studio-20-preview-android.html?linkId=19484754
